name: Marinated Fruit Salad
author: ChriSciLLa
summary: This tropical fruit salad with pineapple, persimmons, kiwi, apple, and grapes is marinated in orange marmalade and juice.
ingredients: 1  ripe pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
3  kiwis, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices
2  Fuyu persimmons, peeled and thinly sliced
directions: Combine pineapple, kiwis, grapes, apple, and persimmons in a large serving bowl
Stir together pineapple-orange-banana juice, marmalade, and ginger in a small bowl
Pour over fruit and toss to combine
Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 6 hours
Remove fruit salad from refrigerator and add bananas; toss gently to combine
